about_the_game:
In this near-future world where Roe v. Wade has been overturned, an abortionist turned pro-life crusader hides dark secrets in his cabin in the woods.

Directed by: John Christopher Gibson
Produced by: J. Todd Coleman
Written by: William Haskins
Starring: Michael S. Wilson, Peter Marquardt, Evan Gamble

Dedicated to game producer and actor Peter Marquardt, whose work produced games like Deus Ex, Anachronox, and Mushroom Men; he's also well known for his role as Moco, the bad boss in El Mariachi.
